requirement.name: F:connect_user
requirement.summary: One of the basic functions of this application involves communcation between two devices.

requirement.name: F:connect_server
requirement.summary: The application can also be implemented in a way that allows for a server to be used as an intermediary between clients that are not active concurrently.

requirement.name: F:mamange_edit
requirement.summary: Allows the user to open a document, contained in the syncronized file system, to be edited as text.

requirement.name: F:mamange_create
requirement.summary: Allows the user to open a create a document on the syncronized file system.

requirement.name: F:mamange_view
requirement.summary: Displays an overall view of all files contained in a certain project.

requirement.name: F:mamange_sync
requirement.summary: Syncronized the files for the database.

requirement.name: F:write_save
requirement.summary: Documents can be saved to file or to the server/peer filesystem.

requirement.name: F:write_open
requirement.summary: Allows the user to open a document to be edited as text.

requirement.name: F:write_color
requirement.summary: Text based color highlighting for atleast one language.

requirement.name: F:text_sync
requirement.summary: Realtime text syncronization between one or more users.

requirement.name: R:connect_secure
requirement.summary: The connection to the server/peer needs to be reasonably secure.

requirement.name: C:server
requirement.summary: A server is neccesary for communcation between clients. This can be embedded in the user software or implemented seperately.

requirement.name: C:storage
requirement.summary: A method of storing files is to be determined at a later date.

requirement.name: P:manage_network
requirement.summary: Networking portions of the software need to be able to handle realtime text syncronization and concurrent file transfers.
